en: All right. Stretch it out.
zh: 好吧，拉伸一下

en: How was your run?
zh: 跑步怎么样。

en: I think it might have been my personal best. Two miles in 46 minutes.
zh: 我觉得这也许是我的个人最佳成绩，两英里用时46分钟。

en: You're really committed to this.
zh: 你真的很投入

en: Good for you.
zh: 不错

en: Yeah, well, you know how they talk about that runner's high? Well, it's real.
zh: 是啊，你知道大家说的跑步者高潮吧？那是真的

en: It's not great, but it's real.
zh: 那不算很棒，但那是真的

en: Nice. So, listen, I got a call, about you.
zh: 不错，听着，我接到了一通电话，是关于你的.

en: Okay.
zh: 好吧

en: You do know we're having a drought.
zh: 你知道这里在闹旱灾吧！

en: Yeah, I've chosen not to participate. So you got a call?
zh: 我选择不参与，你接到了一通电话。

en: Right. It was a very surprising call.
zh: 对，那让我很惊讶

en: Why are you dragging this out?
zh: 为什么你一直在拖延

en: Because you're in a good mood and I'm gonna miss that.
zh: 因为你心情很好，我会很怀念的

en: Who called?
zh: 谁打来的？

en: It was a private investigator hired to track you down.
zh: 是一名受雇追查你下落的私家侦探。

en: All right, pack your bags, We knew this day would come.
zh: 好吧，打包行李，我们都知道这天会来的

en: No. No, no, no.
zh: 不不

en: He was hired by your mother.
zh: 他受雇于你母亲。

en: What?
zh: 什么

en: She wants to meet you.
zh: 她想见你

en: You okay? Is that a good "Huh"? A bad "Huh"? A shoot the messenger "Huh"?
zh: 你没事吧，那声哈是表示好，还是不好，还是要杀掉信使啊

en: How'd this guy find me?
zh: 这人怎么找到我的

en: Um, well, your recent DUI seems to be the gift that keeps on giving.
zh: 这个嘛，你最近的酒驾后果接连不断啊。

en: Anyway, your mom lives in San Francisco, but she'd be willing to drive here if you want to meet her.
zh: 总之，你妈妈住在旧金山，但如果你想见她，她很乐意开车过来。

en: Nice to know she gave up her kid but kept the car. Okay, here's what I want you to do.
zh: 很高兴得知她送走了孩子但是留下了车，我想让你这样做

en: I want you to call this detective and tell him he's got the wrong Bonnie Plunkett. My mother died stopping terrorists from blowing up Disneyland.
zh: 我想让你打给这个侦探，告诉他 他找错了邦妮·普兰科特，我妈妈因为阻止恐怖分子炸掉迪斯尼乐园而牺牲了。

en: What?
zh: 什么？

en: That's what I decided when I was nine, and I'm sticking with it.
zh: 这是我九岁时做出的决定，我要坚持这个说法。

en: Okay, I'll call him.
zh: 好吧，我会给他打电话。

en: Wait! Stop.
zh: 等等

en: Didn't move.
zh: 我没动

en: What is going on here? Why am I getting so upset about this? This is just a woman I share DNA with. maybe I should meet her.
zh: 怎么回事啊？我为什么这么生气。这只是个和我共享基因的女人。也许我该和她见面。

en: Who knows? Maybe I'll need a kidney or bone marrow someday.
zh: 谁知道呢，也许我以后会需要肾脏或者骨髓。

en: Liver, more likely. For god's sakes, it's a historic drought!
zh: 更可能是肝脏，看在老天的份上，这可是百年一遇的旱灾

en: Nope, not gonna do it. If I need an organ, I'll get it from you.
zh: 不，还是不见，如果我需要器官 我就用你的

en: My liver might not be an upgrade.
zh: 我的肝脏可能没什么改善。

en: That woman gave me up when I was four years old.
zh: 那女人在我四岁时送走了我。

en: You know what happens to four-year-olds who get tossed into the system?
zh: 你知道被送去寄养的。四岁小孩会怎么样吗？

en: They don't get adopted, especially when they're five feet tall!
zh: 他们不会被领养，特别是他们身高五英尺时。

en: Okay, we're walking again. Hey, how 'bout we go to a meeting?
zh: 又在乱跑了，我们去参加会议怎么样

en: You go to a meeting. I'm going for a run.
zh: 你去吧，我要去跑步

en: You just did that.
zh: 你刚跑了！

en: Remember how I used to do blow? Now I run like that.
zh: 记得我以前是怎么吸毒的吗，现在我那样跑步。

en: So you're not the least bit curious to meet her?
zh: 所以你一点都不想跟她见面吗？

en: She's not my mother. This woman is more my mother. She's fed me more times.
zh: 她不是我妈妈，这女人都更像我妈，她喂养我的次数更多。

en: Be nice if you said "Please" and "Thank you" once in a while.
zh: 如果你时不时说句"请"和"谢谢"就好了。

en: In her defense, she did give you life.
zh: 帮她说句话，她的确给了你生命

en: I disagree.
zh: 我不同意！

en: How do you disagree with that?
zh: 你要怎么辩啊？

en: I would've gotten here some other way.
zh: 我会以别的方式来到这世界

en: Don't you wonder what she wants?
zh: 你不好奇她想怎么样吗？

en: Who cares what she wants? First she wanted a little girl, then she didn't want a little girl. Now she wants a little girl again?
zh: 谁在乎啊，一开始她想要个小女孩，然后她不想要小女孩了，现在她又想要小女孩了。

en: Well, I'm not gonna be her little girl. Not gonna happen.
zh: 我才不要当她的小女孩，不可能！

en: She thinks she's a little girl?
zh: 她觉得自己是个小女孩吗？

en: Bonnie, I know you don't want to hear this, But seeing her again might be good for you. It might be healing.
zh: 邦妮，我知道你不想听，但是跟她见面可能对你有好处，也许能治愈你！

en: Oh, please. Who am I if I heal?
zh: 拜托，如果我治愈了，那我是谁啊？

en: I want to meet her.
zh: 我想见她！

en: You're kidding, right?
zh: 你开玩笑的对吧！

en: She's my grandmother. I'd like to know where I come from.
zh: 她是我外婆，我想了解我来自什么家庭。

en: I can't believe you're not on my side with this.
zh: 难以置信你居然不站在我这边

en: I'm not taking sides. We have no relatives.
zh: 我没有选边站，我们没亲戚！

en: Roscoe had to make a family tree for school last year. It had one leaf.
zh: 去年罗斯科得画一个家谱交作业，那只有一片叶子！

en: Wouldn't it have four leaves since he has a sibling and...
zh: 不该有四片叶子吗，因为他有姐姐

en: Trying to make a point, Wendy.
zh: 我在表明观点呢，温蒂！

en: Do what you want. You're welcome.
zh: 你想怎么做都行，不用谢。

en: I'm Christy Plunkett.
zh: 我是克丽丝蒂·普兰科特。

en: Hello, Christy.
zh: 你好，克丽丝蒂。

en: It is so nice to meet you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: Well, it's nice to meet you, too. You are so pretty.
zh: 我也是，你真漂亮！

en: Thank you.
zh: 谢谢！

en: You smell like gingerbread. That's always how I imagined you'd smell.
zh: 你闻起来像是姜饼，我一直想着你就散发这种味道。

en: You imagined smelling me?
zh: 你想过闻我吗？

en: Mostly at Christmas. I think we have the same nose.
zh: 大部分时候都在圣诞节，我们的鼻子好像一样

en: Okay, now, this is getting weird.
zh: 好吧，这变得很奇怪了

en: Wait, aren't you Shirley Stabler?
zh: 等等，你不是雪莉·斯特布勒吗

en: No, that's me.
zh: 不，那是我

en: I'm sorry. I thought you were my grandmother.
zh: 对不起，我还以为你是我外婆

en: Well, we're even. I thought you were nuts.
zh: 我们扯平了，我以为你是疯子呢！

en: Nice to meet you.
zh: 很高兴见到你

en: It's nice to meet you, too.
zh: 我也是。

en: Ah. You smell like cigarettes. Yep, you're my grandmother.
zh: 你闻起来有烟味，对 你就是我外婆

en: Look at you. You look nothing like I pictured.
zh: 瞧瞧你，你看起来和我想象的完全不一样

en: That lady thought I was pretty.
zh: 那位女士觉得我很漂亮。

en: Oh, you are. You're beautiful. No way that's your natural hair color. But it looks good on you.
zh: 是啊，你的确漂亮，那不可能是你的天生发色，但挺好看的

en: I'm sorry your daughter couldn't be here.
zh: 抱歉你女儿不能来！

en: Oh, that's okay. I figured it was a 50/50 shot.
zh: 没关系，我猜也只有一半的可能性。

en: It's cute you thought it was that close.
zh: 你居然觉得可能性有这么大，真可爱！

en: I'm guessing she hates me.
zh: 我猜她恨我吧！

en: Yeah, but she hates so many people. She hates Elton John. I mean, who hates Elton John? The guy's a hit machine.
zh: 是啊 但是她恨好多人，她讨厌艾尔顿·约翰，谁讨厌艾尔顿·约翰啊，那人可是个热歌大师！

en: Oh, so you're a babbler, huh?
zh: 你是个喋喋不休的人啊！

en: Only when I'm uncomfortable.
zh: 只有在我不舒服的时候

en: Not that I'm uncomfortable now. I mean...
zh: 不是说我现在不舒服，我是说...

en: Yeah. Yeah, I am a babbler.
zh: 对，我就是喋喋不休。

en: Well, I'm glad you came.
zh: 很高兴你来了。

en: You look like you turned out fine.
zh: 你看上去好像挺好的。

en: Actually, the first 33 years were kind of touch and go. I was an alcoholic and a stripper and a bit of a drug addict.
zh: 实际上，前33年情况有些危险，我曾是个酒瘾者，脱衣舞女，也算是吸毒者。

en: Oh, Christy.
zh: 克丽丝蒂

en: I turned it around.
zh: 我扭转了！

en: Hey, go find your own granddaughter.
zh: 去找你自家外孙女去。

en: Now I have a great job, I've gone back to school, I have two terrific kids.
zh: 现在我有了一份不错的工作，回去上学了，有两个很棒的孩子。

en: You got any pictures?
zh: 你有照片吗？

en: Okay. This is Roscoe. He's ten. This was a rash I was concerned about, but it's cleared up. This is Violet.
zh: 好吧，这是罗斯科，他十岁了。那是我，很担心的一块皮疹，但它消掉了，这是维奥莉特。

en: Oh, she's a beauty.
zh: 她真是个美女。

en: And there's your daughter.
zh: 还有，这是你女儿

en: Those eyes. The same beautiful eyes. Did she finally grow into those big feet of hers?
zh: 这对眼睛，同样的美丽的眼睛，她的身高是不是和大脚相符了

en: Almost.
zh: 差不多吧。

en: So what happened with the whole thing with you?
zh: 那么，你俩是怎么回事啊

en: Oh. Right to the chase, huh?
zh: 直奔主题啊！

en: It's okay, you don't have to.
zh: 没事，你不必说。

en: No. No, no, no. That's why we're here.
zh: 不不不，这是我们来的原因。

en: Well，right after I turned 20, Bonnie's father got killed in a motorcycle accident.
zh: 我满20岁后，邦妮的父亲死于摩托车事故。

en: And I didn't have no family to help me out, so I had to get work, mostly cleaning houses.
zh: 我没有家人帮我，所以我得工作，大部分是打扫房屋。

en: Um, I couldn't afford a babysitter, so I got fired a lot for bringing Bonnie with me.
zh: 我请不起保姆，所以我经常因为带上了邦妮而被炒。

en: It was bad. There were some days when I could barely afford to feed her.
zh: 那很糟糕，有时候我都没钱给她买吃的。

en: I once gambled away our rent money and ended up with my kids in a motel.
zh: 我曾经输光了房租，最后跟我的孩子们住在汽车旅馆里。

en: You trying to top my story?
zh: 你想跟我比惨吗？

en: No, no. I'm sorry. Go on.
zh: 不是啦，对不起，继续吧！

en: Well, anyway, the day that I moved us into my car, I figured the only shot she had at a decent life ，was if I put her in foster care. So that's what I did.
zh: 总之，在我们住到车里的那天，我认为她过上像样生活的唯一机会，就是我把她送去寄养，所以，我就送了

en: That's heartbreaking.
zh: 那真是令人心碎！

en: I'm glad she could be a better mother to you than I was to her.
zh: 我真高兴，比起我对她，她对你来说是个更好的妈妈。

en: Let's just say it's a horse race.
zh: 这么说吧，你俩还胜负未定。

en: Not as simple as you think. She had no money, she couldn't feed you. Giving you up broke her heart.
zh: 不如你想的那么简单，她没有钱，养不起你，送你去领养让她心碎。

en: Nice story. I'm sticking with the Disneyland terrorists.
zh: 故事不错，我要坚持迪斯尼乐园恐怖分子的说法！

en: You need to see her. It might be your last chance.
zh: 你得去见她，这可能是你最后的机会了。

en: What are you talking about?
zh: 你说些什么呢？

en: The reason she reached out to you is she's dying.
zh: 她来找你的原因是她快死了。

en: How long does she have?
zh: 她还能活多久？

en: Couple months.
zh: 几个月？

en: I'm going for a run.
zh: 我要去跑步！

en: Really? Is that the new thing with you? Every time you can't deal with your feelings, you go jogging?
zh: 真的吗，这是你的新事物吗，每次你处理不好自己的感情，就去跑步吗？

en: You're right. Why don't you make some tea? We'll sit down and talk about it.
zh: 你说得对，你泡点茶吧，我们坐下来谈谈。

en: Thank you. Now you're acting like an adult.
zh: 谢谢，你现在表现得像是成年人了。

en: I'm still making tea.
zh: 我还是要泡茶！

en: Five minutes, and then we're out of here.
zh: 就五分钟，然后我们就走。

en: I'm really proud of you.
zh: 我真的为你骄傲。

en: Hey, if I were dying, I know you'd want to see me.
zh: 如果我快死了，我知道你会想来见我的。

en: Wouldn't miss it for the world.
zh: 我绝不会错过的。

en: Hello, Christy.
zh: 你好啊，克丽丝蒂。

en: Well, well, well. Mom. Finally decided to crawl out from under your rock, huh?
zh: 哎哟，终于决定从石头下爬出来了啊

en: No, you brought me here, I'm doing this.
zh: 不，是你带我来的，我要这样做

en: You're a real piece of work, wanting my forgiveness.
zh: 你真有种，想要我的原谅。

en: Mom, please...
zh: 妈，拜托！

en: I don't know what you're dying of, but I hope it's slow and painful.
zh: 我不知道你因为什么病要死了，但我希望这过程缓慢痛苦。

en: She's not your mother.
zh: 她不是你妈。

en: You have a super day.
zh: 祝你今天愉快。

en: Christy.
zh: 克丽丝蒂。

en: Oh, good. This is your mother.
zh: 真好，这是你妈妈

en: Hello, Bonnie.
zh: 你好 邦妮

en: Probably be more comfortable if we sat down. I'll go first.
zh: 也许我们坐下来会更舒服。我先坐。

en: Well, I was wrong about it being more comfortable.
zh: 我说会更舒服，是我错了

en: Thank you so much for being willing to see me.
zh: 多谢你愿意见我。

en: I'm only here 'cause you're about to die. What do you got anyway?
zh: 我来这里只是因为你快死了，你得了什么病？

en: Uh, it's my heart.
zh: 心脏病。

en: Something hereditary we need to worry about?
zh: 是我们得担心的遗传病吗？

en: No, just years of hard living finally caught up with me.
zh: 不，只是多年艰苦的生活导致的。

en: Maybe we should worry a little.
zh: 也许我们该担心一点。

en: Honey, I knew what I was gonna say to you when I saw you, but now I don't know where to start.
zh: 亲爱的，我知道我见到你时打算跟你说什么，但现在我不知道从何说起了。

en: Just tell her what you told me.
zh: 跟她说说你对我说的话啊。

en: Bonnie, giving you up was the hardest thing and the worst mistake I ever made in my whole life.
zh: 邦妮，送你去领养是我这辈子做过的最艰难的事和犯下的最糟糕的错。

en: But I want you to know that I thought of you every single day.
zh: 但是我想告诉你，我每天都在想你。

en: Yeah, terrific. Why didn't you come back? You said you were gonna come back.
zh: 真棒，你为什么不回来，你说你会回来的。

en: Well, I wanted to. I tried.
zh: 我想的，我试过了！

en: You left me bouncing around foster homes.
zh: 你让我在寄养家庭之间被踢来踢去。

en: I was trying to make money, trying to get on my feet.
zh: 我在努力赚钱，摆脱困境。

en: Yeah, so?
zh: 好吧，所以呢？

en: It got complicated.
zh: 事情变得很复杂。

en: What the hell does that mean?
zh: 那是什么意思？

en: Oh, god. I was a cocktail waitress in Tahoe. And I met this guy, and I moved in with him.
zh: 天啊。我曾是塔霍的酒吧服务员，我遇见了一个男人，跟他同居了。

en: And?
zh: 然后呢？

en: And...
zh: 然后

en: Tell me.
zh: 告诉我

en: He said he didn't want any kids around.
zh: 他说他不想要孩子。

en: I'm sorry. I didn't know this part.
zh: 抱歉，我不知道这部分。

en: So you picked your happiness over mine.
zh: 所以你选择了你的幸福，而不是我的。

en: I was young, I was scared. What can I say? I screwed up.
zh: 我当时很年轻，很害怕，我能怎么做呢？我搞砸了！

en: No, I screwed up with her. What you did to me is unforgivable.
zh: 不 我对她才是搞砸了，你对我做的事是无可原谅的

en: I know.
zh: 我知道

en: On the bright side, she's dying.
zh: 往好的方面看，她快死了！

en: You were gone a long time.
zh: 你走了很久！

en: I decided to run until I wasn't mad anymore. I went, like, 18 miles, puked and had to take the bus back.
zh: 我决定跑步 直到我不再生气，我大概跑了18英里，吐了，不得不坐公交回来

en: Listen, Marjorie really wanted to talk to you, so...
zh: 听着，玛乔丽想跟你谈谈，所以...

en: Stop. I already know what she's gonna say. I don't need to hear it come out，of her shrunken little apple head.
zh: 别说了，我已经知道她要说什么了，我没必要听她用她的萎缩小苹果头说出来。

en: Hello, Bonnie.
zh: 你好啊，邦妮。

en: Do you not know how to give a heads up?
zh: 你不知道怎么提醒我吗？

en: Sit down and listen to the apple head.
zh: 坐下，听苹果头说话。

en: Let me guess, you want me to forgive my mother and invite her back into my life.
zh: 让我猜猜，你想要我原谅我母亲邀请她重回我的生活。

en: No, I just...
zh: 不，我只是...

en: That woman threw me away, and I've spent every day since then thinking I was unlovable.
zh: 那女人抛弃了我，从那天开始的每一天，我都觉得我不招人喜欢

en: And sometimes you are. That being said, there might be an alternative to hating your mother for the rest of your life.
zh: 有时候你的确如此。话虽如此，但你可能还有别的选择，而不是这辈子都恨你母亲。

en: You got my attention.
zh: 你引起了我的注意。

en: Come on in.
zh: 进来吧！

en: Thanks for seeing me.
zh: 谢谢你见我！

en: Oh, I was so happy when you called. You want some coffee?
zh: 你打电话来时我好高兴，你想喝咖啡吗？

en: Sure.
zh: 好啊。

en: Black okay?
zh: 黑咖啡可以吗？

en: That's fine. So how long have you lived here?
zh: 可以，你在这里住了多久？

en: About 20 years.
zh: 大概20年！

en: It's nice.
zh: 这里挺不错的。

en: No, it ain't.
zh: 才不是。

en: No, it ain't.
zh: 的确不是。

en: I guess you got a lot of questions for me huh?
zh: 我想你要问我很多问题啊！

en: Well, yeah. I don't know anything about my father. I don't even know his name.
zh: 是啊，我对我父亲一无所知，甚至连他的名字都不知道》

en: It was Henry. Uh, just a terrific guy. Had a great sense of humor. He was handsome, tall. Couldn't ride a motorcycle to save his life. Literally.
zh: 他叫亨利，他是个好人，很有幽默感，他高大英俊，车技不好，真的！

en: So he wasn't Paul Newman. And another fantasy dies.
zh: 他不是保罗·纽曼，另一个幻想破灭了！

en: I thought you might like to have a picture of him.
zh: 我觉得你也许想拥有他的照片。

en: Is that me he's holding?
zh: 他抱的是我吗》

en: Yeah.
zh: 是的。

en: What, was I about two years old here?
zh: 这时候我大概两岁吗？

en: No, about six months.
zh: 不，大概六个月。

en: So what was your deal? Drugs? Booze?
zh: 你怎么回事，吸毒，酗酒。

en: Sorry?
zh: 抱歉？

en: Well, I just assumed if we're related, it must be one or the other or both.
zh: 我只是觉得如果我们是母女，肯定两者必占其一，或者两者都是。

en: Oh, no.
zh: 不

en: Well, I smoked a little pot, but it just always made me paranoid. And I never developed a taste for alcohol.
zh: 我抽过一点大麻，但那一直让我很多疑，我从来都不喜欢喝酒。

en: It has a taste?
zh: 还有不喜欢的吗？

en: Uh, Christy told me that you had a problem. But you seem to be dealing with it.
zh: 克丽丝蒂告诉我你有麻烦，但你好像在处理。

en: I'm doing great.
zh: 我挺好的。

en: Yes, you are.
zh: 是的。

en: Anyway, I came here to, uh, tell you that, um, I forgive you.
zh: 总之，我来这里是想告诉你，我原谅你了。

en: Mm, thank you.
zh: 谢谢！

en: No, don't thank me. I'm not doing it for you. I'm doing it for me.
zh: 不 别谢我，我这样做不是为了你，而是为了我。

en: What do you mean?
zh: 你什么意思？

en: Shirley, a good friend of mine told me, if I could forgive you, I could finally be free of all the anger in my heart.
zh: 雪莉，我的一个好朋友告诉我，如果我原谅你，我的心里可能就不会再愤怒。

en: And I really need to be free of it. Because if I'm not, I'm gonna drink again. Or jog myself to death.
zh: 我真的需要解脱，因为如果不这样，我就会再次酗酒，或者跑到死。

en: That's good. Then we... we can start over.
zh: 那挺好的，我们可以从头来过。

en: No, I don't think so.
zh: 我想不行。

en: I Just because I forgive you doesn't mean I want you in my life. That's something my friend told me, too.
zh: 我原谅你不代表，我想让你出现在我的生活之中，那也是我朋友告诉我的。

en: Who's this friend?
zh: 这朋友是谁。

en: Well, to be honest, she's not so much a friend as the mother I never had. But I'll be damned if I'll tell her that.
zh: 说实话，她不像是朋友，更像是我未曾拥有过的母亲，但我绝对不会告诉她那话的。

en: Okay, uh, I got to go.
zh: 好吧，我得走了！

en: Already? Am I... am I gonna see you again?
zh: 就走吗，我会再次见到你吗？

en: I don't know. Maybe. I need some time.
zh: 我不知道，也许吧，我需要一些时间。

en: Can I at least give you a hug?
zh: 我能抱抱你吗？

en: I'm sorry, I don't think so. Not... not yet.
zh: 抱歉，不行，现在还不行。

en: Thank you for the picture.
zh: 谢谢你给我照片

en: Did you have a nice time at your dad's?
zh: 你在你爸家玩得开心吗？

en: Yeah, it was great. So, listen. I'm a little confused. How long have you known about her?
zh: 挺好的，听着，我有点困惑，你知道她的事有多久了？

en: Well, we met her a couple days ago.
zh: 我们是几天前跟她见面的。

en: So what do I call her? Great-grandma?
zh: 我该怎么称呼她，曾外婆吗？

en: I think she'd really like that.
zh: 我觉得她会很喜欢这称呼的。

en: I made cookies.
zh: 我做了饼干。

en: Who says you can't pick your family?
zh: 谁说你不能选择家人啊！
